name: Designing for healthcare in India: Simple
description: In a busy hospital in India, a nurse or doctor often has only 3-4 minutes with each of her patients. How can we design digital tools that reflect the constraints and workflows of a typical public hospital in a place like India? We will discuss our UX approach, prototyping and testing, and how we've succeeded so far in helping 1.8 million people with chronic disease to get better care. This is where design can truly make the world better, one patient at a time.
